name: Saadsadfy
title: Business Writing | Content Writing | Designer
description:
Introducing Saad Sadfy, the dynamic force of writing and marketing prowess that will revolutionize your business. With a pen as mighty as a sword and a mind as sharp as a diamond, Saad is the secret ingredient you've been craving. 
 
In the vast realm of business writing, Saad reigns supreme. Armed with a treasure trove of skills, he fearlessly navigates the intricacies of business plans, proposals, market research, grants, and presentations. He'll weave the perfect tapestry of words, ensuring your business plan captivates investors and your proposals leave clients begging for more. Need market research that uncovers hidden gems? Saad has you covered. Grants and pitch decks? He'll transform them into works of art that secure your success. In the kingdom of business writing, Saad Sadfy is the undefeated champion. 
 
But don't let his business prowess fool you; Saad is also a master of creative writing. He'll pen mesmerizing eBooks that transport readers to otherworldly realms, autobiographies that chronicle lives in extraordinary ways, and whitepapers that distill complex ideas into easy-to-understand brilliance. And if you're in need of a script or screenplay, Saad will spin a tale that takes audiences on an unforgettable journey. Creativity flows through his veins like a never-ending river…

name: JoelHipkins
title: CMS | WordPress | Shopify | Wix | Framer | Webflow
description:
Transform Your Business with High-Performing Websites & Scalable E-Commerce Solutions 
 
Hi there! I'm Joel, a results-driven web developer with a Master’s in IT from Virginia Tech and over seven years of experience in crafting high-converting, fully optimized websites. I specialize in Shopify, WordPress, CMS, and custom web development, ensuring your business has a strong, professional, and scalable digital presence. 
 
Whether you need a custom Shopify store, a WordPress-powered business website, or seamless API integrations, I deliver fast, responsive, and SEO-optimized solutions tailored to your needs. 
 
What I Offer 
✔️Custom Shopify & WordPress Development – Fully responsive, mobile-friendly, and optimized for conversions 
✔️E-Commerce Solutions – Shopify, WooCommerce, and Magento development, payment gateway integration, cart optimization 
✔️Performance & SEO Optimization – Lightning-fast loading speed, technical SEO, and Core Web Vitals improvements 
✔️ Frontend Development – Frontend expertise for seamless end-to-end solutions…

text: Unfortunately the project could not be complete for a variety of reasons but the work they did was reasonable, timelines were not great but their communication was pretty good. I think this project was a little large and next time would make it into smaller pieces and work on them piece by peice.

author: Babak B.
text: The Opencollar team has been an amazing resource for our business.  Nick has been a pleasure to work with providing prompt communication and insights.    Thanks to the OC team for completing our MVP concept that is now ready to go to market.   We're looking forward to continuing to work with them again as we grow.

author: Bradley J.
text: They did do a good job in development in the beginning but had very slow communication to almost none.  We started this project last September/October in 2023 and now its September 2024 and the project has bugs and issues.  We actually had to hire another company to come and complete the project in just 3 days so we could get our working prototype off the ground.   While they were very knowledgeable in software development, they were very slow in communication or responding to questions or bugs.

name: netishas

Is your branding failing to make an impact in a crowded market?

I help businesses break through these challenges with strategic, high-converting design solutions, from stunning graphics to conversion-focused websites.

text: Being completely new to the process of creating a website, they were very responsive to all of my questions and my requests, and they did it for a very reasonable price.  I would certainly recommend them to anyone who is new to the world of website creation.

author: William S.
text: Whatever the issues is, they take care of it.

author: David R.
text: Working with QTech has been a GREAT experience! They were very responsive from the very beginning, outlining expectations, costs and timelines. Once the work got started, they did a great job turning what I gave them into a working site. They handled edits quickly and got them right. Never hesitating to knock them out. I felt like they went above and beyond to make sure I was happy, which I am - as are my clients. I will definitely be using them again for my next web projects.

author: William S.
text: Whatever the project I propose, they figure out how to do it!
